project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install required libraries (like requests)
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the received data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the function fetching and parsing the weather data
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
